typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		rate as decimal(28,10),
		currency_id_from as long,
		currency_code_from as string,
		currency_id_to as long,
		currency_code_to as string,
		day as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.hlp_exchange_rate',
	format: 'query') ~> hlpExchRate
source(output(
		dimension_key as long,
		tot_description as string,
		tot_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		cur_last_exch_rate_to_usd as decimal(28,10),
		cur_eu as string,
		cur_iso_code as string,
		cur_oecd as string,
		cur_2ltr_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from marts.dim_currency',
	format: 'query') ~> dimCurrency
source(output(
		day as date,
		dimension_key as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select day,dimension_key from dwh_stage.sta_dim_time',
	format: 'query') ~> dimTime
hlpExchRate, dimCurrency lookup(currency_code_from == cur_iso_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCurFrom
LkpCurFrom select(mapColumn(
		day,
		rate,
		cur_dim_key_from = dimension_key,
		each(match(startsWith(name,'currency_')),
			'source_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns, dimCurrency lookup(source_currency_code_to == cur_iso_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCurTo
LkpCurTo select(mapColumn(
		source_day = day,
		source_rate = rate,
		cur_dim_key_from,
		source_currency_code_from,
		source_currency_code_to,
		source_currency_id_from,
		source_currency_id_to,
		cur_dim_key_to = dimension_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelevantColumns
SelectRelevantColumns, dimTime lookup(source_day == day,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpExchDate
LkpExchDate select(mapColumn(
		dim_time = dimension_key,
		exchange_rate = source_rate,
		dim_currency_from = cur_dim_key_from,
		dim_currency_to = cur_dim_key_to,
		from_currency_code = source_currency_code_from,
		to_currency_code = source_currency_code_to,
		exchange_date = day
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectToReduceCol
SelectToReduceCol aggregate(groupBy(dim_time,
		exchange_rate,
		dim_currency_from,
		dim_currency_to,
		from_currency_code,
		to_currency_code),
	exchange_date = first(exchange_date)) ~> Deduplicator
Deduplicator alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		dim_currency_to as long,
		dim_currency_from as long,
		from_currency_code as string,
		dim_time as long,
		exchange_rate as decimal(28,10),
		exchange_date as date,
		to_currency_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['dim_time','from_currency_code','to_currency_code'],
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> factExchangeRate
